titles: A treatise, vvritten by M. doctor Carier, vvherein hee layeth downe sundry learned and pithy considerations by which he was moued, to forsake the Protestant congregation, and to betake himselfe to the Catholke Apostolike Roman Church. Agreeing verbatim with the written copye, addressed by the sayd doctor to the King his most excellent Maiestie.
author: Carier, Benjamin, 1566-1614.
notes: Printer and place of publication from STC.
Text followed by three p. of ms. notes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Church and state --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
